name: Tank Battle Resist
description:
Tank Battle Resist is a tribute to our childhood favorite, the very famous 16-bit console game Tanks 1990. But this is also a brand new game. Through our carefully designed and produced small tanks, as well as various levels, it supports single-player or two-player cooperative combat, bringing unprecedented joy to players. The game is easy to operate, supports keyboard control, and gamepad control (supports up to two gamepads), whether you play it by yourself, or play with family and friends at a party, you will never get tired of it.

This game supports single-player and two-player cooperation. Support two people to use a keyboard to input, support one person to use a keyboard, and one person to use a gamepad. It also supports the computer to connect two gamepads to play games.
